page.title: 08Fordingbridge-Vimoutiers.
page.content: judging at the Recreation Ground. The afternoon's festivities included games, sideshows, maypole and country dancing. There was also a Boules Tournament (French style) and a football match between Fordingbridge Turks and Vimoutiers. On Sunday 30th May there was an {Interdenominational Service}at St. Mary's Church to celebrate The Twinning. Later in the afternoon two new roads at Westacres were named {Vimoutiers Court}and{Normandy Way}to honour our new French friends. {Fordingbridge International {Friendship Association,}which pioneered the twinning, are pleased that exchanges between schools, clubs and families continue to stimulate interest and give enjoyment to the residents of both towns.
